summary: Utility class that prepares configurations and synthetic inputs, instantiates TensorFlow MPNet models, and validates their behavior across a range of NLP tasks such as masked language modeling, multipleâ€‘choice, question answering, sequence classification, and token classification.
business_intent: Provide a reusable testing harness to verify the correctness and stability of TensorFlow MPNet implementations, enabling automated quality assurance for NLP model deployments.
